job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p>Our client is the next big thing. They're in stealth mode, backed by two household-name billionaires and focused on the war on cancer.</p><p><br></p><p>You will work with a team of machine learning scientists and engineers to develop and deploy AI-based biomarkers to support the personalization of cancer therapy. You will work closely with our engineering team to build production-grade APIs and serving models that integrate with our clinical product.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Minimum Qualifications: </strong></p><ul><li>BS or MS in an AI-related field (CS, EE, Stats, etc.) or substantial development experience in AI.</li><li>Strong programming skills, competitive in ACM-ICPC or other competitions.</li><li>Substantial experience with Python, and deep learning libraries such as PyTorch or Tensorflow</li><li>Experience in implementing high-performance and large-scale deep learning systems. </li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Preferred Qualifications:</strong></p><ul><li>Full time industry experience in deep learning research/product.</li><li>Experience mentoring and advising other engineers</li></ul>
